name: Carbuncle
description: The Carbuncle features a vibrant garnet gemstone and has a small, agile body well-suited for jungles. Its unique abilities make it a versatile companion, aiding allies with illumination and stealth.
memorable: Its ability to emit light and camouflage in jungle terrain makes it a standout companion and scout.
goals: The Carbuncle typically aims to assist allies through scouting, illumination, and evasion.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other jungle creatures or as a companion to adventurers.
strengths: Good at stealth and perception, with special abilities enhancing its usefulness in combat.
weaknesses: Low physical damage output due to low Strength.
attacks: Can use a Multiattack to deliver a bite and a claw attack, dealing piercing and slashing damage respectively.
most_powerful_ability: Light Beam is a powerful attack that creates a line of radiant damage, affecting multiple foes.
senses: The Carbuncle has a passive perception of 15, making it quite effective at detecting hidden creatures.
skills: It possesses good proficiency in stealth and perception, enhancing its capabilities in exploration.
additional_information: Advantage on Stealth checks in jungle terrain.
Can create light to illuminate dark areas.
Effective in support roles during exploration and combat.
